tool_description: The simplest way to remove image backgrounds through API
name: Background removal
title: Background removal

api_list.name: Upload File
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to remove background from file uploaded. The response would be in base64 formate. You can goto this website and paste the base64 string to get the image https://codebeautify.org/base64-to-image-converter. Or else one can do it programmatically.

utterances.utterance: Can you remove the background from this photo of a golden retriever puppy?
Please take out the background from the image of the Eiffel Tower at sunset.
I need the background removed from my portrait picture taken at the beach.
Could you eliminate the background from this product photo of a red leather handbag?
Remove the background from the image showing a mountain landscape with a clear blue sky.
I want the background erased from this snapshot of a classic vintage car.
Please extract the subject by removing the background from this photo of a ballerina dancing.
Can you clear the background from this image of a colorful tropical bird perched on a branch?
I need the background taken out from this close-up photo of a delicious chocolate cake.
Please remove the background from this image of a smiling child holding balloons at a park.
